name: Late Fee Payment: Attack Surge
detail: Increase ATK & while this effect is active, Late Fee Payment "decrease DEF + increase the DEF of the Lender" will be activated at the end of each turn & remove one of the Lender's Paywall when this effect is used

name: Late Fee Payment: Stars Galore
detail: Increase C. Star drop rate & while this effect is active, Late Fee Payment "decrease your HP + recover the Lender's HP" will be activated at the end of each turn & remove one of the Lender's Paywall when this effect is used during a normal attack

name: Late Fee Payment: NP Stockpile
detail: Increase NP Gain during normal attacks & while this effect is active, Late Fee Payment "decrease your Critical Strength + increase the Lender's Critical Strength" will be activated at the end of each turn & remove one of the Lender's Paywall when this effect is used during a normal attack

name: Late Fee Payment: NP Amazing
detail: Increase NP damage & while this effect is active, Late Fee Payment "decrease your C. Star drop rate + increase the Lender's Critical Hit Rate" will be activated at the end of each turn

name: Late Fee Payment: Critical Ouchie
detail: Increase Critical Hit damage & while this effect is active, Late Fee Payment "decrease your NP Strength + increase the Lender's NP Strength" will be activated at the end of each turn & remove one of the Lender's Paywall when this effect is used

name: Late Fee Payment: Quick So Fast
detail: Increase Quick Card effectiveness & while this effect is active, Late Fee Payment "decrease your Arts Card effectiveness + increase the Lender's Arts Card effectiveness" will be activated at the end of each turn & remove one of the Lender's Paywall when this effect is used during a normal attack

name: Late Fee Payment: Art-tack Me
detail: Increase Arts Card effectiveness & while this effect is active, Late Fee Payment "decrease your Buster Card effectiveness + increase the Lender's Buster Card effectiveness" will be activated at the end of each turn & remove one of the Lender's Paywall when this effect is used during a normal attack

name: Late Fee Payment: Buster Dynamic
detail: Increase Buster Card effectiveness & while this effect is active, Late Fee Payment "decrease your Quick Card effectiveness + increase the Lender's Quick Card effectiveness" will be activated at the end of each turn & remove one of the Lender's Paywall when this effect is used during a normal attack

name: Late Fee Payment: Hard Defense
detail: Increase DEF & while this effect is active, Late Fee Payment "decrease your ATK + increase the Lender's ATK" will be activated at the end of each turn & remove one of the Lender's Paywall when this effect is used during a normal attack

name: Late Fee Payment: Invincibly Ripped
detail: Reduce damage taken to 0 & while this effect is active, Late Fee Payment "remove your Buffs + remove the Lender's Debuffs" will be activated at the end of each turn & remove one of the Lender's Paywall when this effect is used
